text: Halls of Montezuma is a 1951 American World War II action movie directed by Lewis Milestone and starring Richard Widmark, Richard Boone, Jack Palance, Karl Malden, Robert Wagner, Reginald Gardiner, Neville Brand, Jack Webb, Martin Milner. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1951 war movies Category:1951 action movies Category:American action movies Category:American war movies Category:World War II movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone
title: Halls of Montezuma (1951 movie)
